text: Akash Ambani (born 23 October 1991) is an Indian businessman, chairman of Reliance Jio, and the son of Mukesh Ambani and Neeta Ambani. ==Education== He went to the Campion School and in Dhirubhai Ambani International School in Mumbai and earned a degree in economics at Brown University. == Personal life == In March 2019, he married Shloka Mehta and they have two children together, a son, Prithvi, and a daughter, Veda. == Related pages == * Isha Ambani * Reliance Industries Limited == References == Category:Indian businesspeople Category:1991 births
title: Akash Ambani
